name: Project DIVA Song File
summary: Learn about .DIVA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: There may be multiple DIVA files for each song which are used for the different difficulty levels. For example there may be easy, normal, and hard modes for each song.
NOTE: DIVA files are saved to the \​songs\​ directory of the Project DIVA installation.

description: Game file used by Project DIVA, a Japanese rhythm game created by SEGA; saves song information; includes a reference to the song .MP3 file and the timings for which events have to be triggered to score points in the game.
